OOC: I'll see. He's supposed to be e-mailing in me in a bit. He's 
already e-mailed me back the question and he has to check if it's 
alright with Mainframe or something. He's gonna e-mail me in a bit 
and than I'll transfer him to Yanshosh and they can make plans. Is 
that alright Yanshosh? Oh, and another ting. Were doing a lot of 
firsts here, so I would like to do one myself. It's pretty 
controversial, so I want to ask permission first. It wouldn't last 
long, as soon as their drunkeness is over, but would it be okay to 
have a homosexual relationship? Not that there's anything wrong with 
having one here or anything. They're people too I mean and they 
should get proper respect. It's just that this says PG-13 and I 
wondered if this is in the limits. If anyone feels uncomfortable 
about it than I won't do it.

Trainers

"Alrigh than," said Prebon, kissing Spears one more time," Remember, 
be brave. Nothing bad is going to happen today. JUst do your best and 
I'll be happy."

Hammer and Ignatius grabbed Spears' arm and forced her up the hill, 
with Prebon following. When they got there they could see a group of 
Maxis talking. Time to make demands.

"Hey, which one of you is Ramulus? I am Prebon, leader of the 
Trainers. I have one simple demand! Meet me alone, one on one, and 
bring a map of all bases on this planet. I will than release both of 
my prisoners! I have already removed the chip from your bot Spears 
here. Look at her scream. Agree to my demands or they will die and 
you will have an eternal enemy of Savage and The Trainers!"
______________________________________________________________________
